Trigger.name: You can't backstab a fighting person, too alert!

regexCodeList.string: You can't backstab a fighting person, too alert!

Trigger.name: Ooops. Your clumsy execution broadcasts your intentions.

regexCodeList.string: Ooops. Your clumsy execution broadcasts your intentions.

Trigger.name: (.+) makes a strange sound as you place (.+) in (.+)!

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) makes a strange sound as you place (.+) in (.+)!)

Trigger.name: (.+) places (.+) in the back of (.+), resulting in some strange noises and blood!

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) places (.+) in the back of (.+), resulting in some strange noises and blood!)

Trigger.name: (.+) clumsily approaches you with (.+) but you fend off the attack\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) clumsily approaches you with (.+) but you fend off the attack\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) is stunned, but will probably regain consciousness\.\.\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) is stunned, but will probably regain consciousness\.\.\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) is incapacitated and will slowly die, if not aided\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) is incapacitated and will slowly die, if not aided\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) is mortally wounded, and will die soon, if not aided\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) is mortally wounded, and will die soon, if not aided\.)

Trigger.name: They already seem to be stunned.

regexCodeList.string: They already seem to be stunned.

Trigger.name: (.+) sends you sprawling with a powerful bash!

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) sends you sprawling with a powerful bash!)

Trigger.name: You dodge a bash from (.+) who loses his balance and falls!

regexCodeList.string: (You dodge a bash from (.+) who loses his balance and falls!)

Trigger.name: As (.+) avoids your bash, you topple over and fall to the ground!

regexCodeList.string: (As (.+) avoids your bash, you topple over and fall to the ground!)

Trigger.name: (.+) avoids being bashed by (.+) who loses (.+) balance and falls!

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) avoids being bashed by (.+) who loses (.+) balance and falls!)

Trigger.name: (.+) sends (.+) sprawling with a powerful bash!

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) sends (.+)(?<!you) sprawling with a powerful bash!)

Trigger.name: (.+) starts barreling down on you, a (.+) aimed at your chest\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) starts barreling down on you, a (.+) aimed at your chest\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) struggles to barrel down on you, a (.+) aimed at your chest\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) struggles to barrel down on you, a (.+) aimed at your chest\.)

Trigger.name: You're hit in solar plexus, wow, this is breathtaking!!

regexCodeList.string: You're hit in solar plexus, wow, this is breathtaking!!

Trigger.name: (.+) gazes deeply into your soul\.\. very chilling\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) gazes deeply into your soul\.\. very chilling\.)

Trigger.name: You feel very paranoid about your surroundings.

regexCodeList.string: You feel very paranoid about your surroundings.

Trigger.name: Fight!? Are you crazy?? You can barely hold yourself together.

regexCodeList.string: Fight!? Are you crazy?? You can barely hold yourself together.

Trigger.name: A great vine constricts tightly around (.+) who is pierced by five hand tall thorns!Ouch!

regexCodeList.string: (A great vine constricts tightly around (.+) who is pierced by five hand tall thorns!Ouch!)

Trigger.name: (.+) can't seem to regain control of himself\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) can't seem to regain control of himself\.)

Trigger.name: You wish that your wounds would stop BLEEDING so much!

regexCodeList.string: You wish that your wounds would stop BLEEDING so much!

Trigger.name: Ooomf PAIN!! You are wracked with pain as you are struck by a sharp stone spear!

regexCodeList.string: Ooomf PAIN!! You are wracked with pain as you are struck by a sharp stone spear!
Your heartbeat calms down more as you feel less panicked.
Your heartbeat races very rapidly as your forehead throbs.
